definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
to arrive at (place or time)/period/to become due/classifier for events, meetings, elections, sporting fixtures, years (of graduation)

sentences.english: Now I'd like to brief you on the 106th Canton Fair.
sentences.chinese: 下面我向大家介绍本届广交会的主要情况。

sentences.english: It was Fabiano's third goal at this World Cup.
sentences.chinese: 这也是法比亚诺在本届世界杯的第3粒入球。

sentences.english: What have you gained from the China Cup 2011?
sentences.chinese: 你通过参加本届中国杯收获了什么？

sentences.english: eg: I sincerely wish this Business Summit a complete success.
sentences.chinese: 我衷心祝愿本届峰会取得圆满成功。

sentences.english: It was Spain's fourth straight one-nothing victory in this World Cup.
sentences.chinese: 这是西班牙连续第四一个没有在本届世界杯上的胜利。

sentences.english: The tournament will be a round robinfor all the high school teams in the city.
sentences.chinese: 本届全市中学队锦标赛将进行循环赛。

sentences.english: Also invited to this site "Top Ten God scissors" paper-cut art show.
sentences.chinese: 还现场邀请本届“十大神剪”展示剪纸技艺。

sentences.english: And that committee will have this administration’s full cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 委员会将得到本届政府的充分合作。

sentences.english: This is the seventh-consecutive day at this World Cup a player has been sent off.
sentences.chinese: 本届世界杯已经连续7天有球员被红牌罚下。

sentences.english: The formation of this fifth Committee cannot come at a better time.
sentences.chinese: 本届委员会的成立适逢其时。

sentences.english: If this Congress fails to deliver change, then we will change Congress.
sentences.chinese: 如果本届国会没有作出改变，我们将改变国会。

sentences.english: Into the current liquidity crisis meeting of the bank treasurers Subject.
sentences.chinese: 流动性危机成为本届银行司库会议的主题词。

sentences.english: Argentina coach Sergio Batista was no exception at this Copa America.
sentences.chinese: 本届美洲杯，阿根廷主教练巴蒂斯塔也不例外。

sentences.english: The Guangzhou Asian Games have received strong support from Asian governments and peoples.
sentences.chinese: 本届亚运会得到了亚洲各国政府和人民的大力支持。

sentences.english: Weightlifters of China gets 8 golds at Beijing Olympic Games.
sentences.chinese: 至此，中国举重在本届奥运会上共获得8块金牌。

sentences.english: You will be looking at preparations for the meeting during this session.
sentences.chinese: 本届执委会期间，你们将审议此次会议的筹备工作。

definition: host/official host (e.g. venue for games or a conference)
to arrive at (place or time)/period/to become due/classifier for events, meetings, elections, sporting fixtures, years (of graduation)
to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel
to compete/to take part in a competition
the curtain falls/lower the curtain/to come to an end (of a meeting)
